I am a person who tries to be interested in things. This is where I keep stuff on the web.

Details of my mathematical work can be found under the maths tab. Sometimes I blog about the things I do, or the things that interest me.

Outside of maths, I like running, hiking, swimming outdoors, and reading books. My favourite number is 26.
